_meta.title: forest_a six baselines, 20 runs, grouped figures (MPC2 OCP hard constraints)
_meta.summary: Evaluate A*, A*-MPC2, Hybrid A*, Hybrid A*-MPC2, RRT*, and RRT-MPC2 with MPC2 reformulated as nonlinear OCP and hard collision-clearance constraints.
notes: MPC2 now solves a continuous steering-sequence OCP (SLSQP) over a local trajectory horizon.
Collision handling is hard-constrained via two-circle clearance constraints (od - min_clearance >= 0).
For strict A/B against historical group4 random pairs, add --rand-pairs-json /tmp/forest_a_pairs20_from_20260207_004053.json.
